text: Sphingomonas histidinilytica is a Gram-negative and non-spore-forming bacteria from the genus of Sphingomonas which has been isolated from hexachlorocyclohexane contaminated soil from a dump site in Ummari near Lucknow in Uttar Pradesh in India.Deutsche Sammlung von Mikroorganismen und Zellkulturen UniProt == Further reading == * == References == ==External links== *Type strain of Sphingomonas histidinilytica at BacDive - the Bacterial Diversity Metadatabase histidinilytica Category:Bacteria described in 2010
title: Sphingomonas histidinilytica
